about_the_game:
The world isn't horror, the horror is the fear inside.
There are some strange musics with us. When you hear them, the fear'll go away.

Record Tracks


1、Farm
2、Gluttony
3、Snow
4、Sloth
5、Forest
6、Envy
7、Volcano
8、Wrath
9、Mystical Laboratory
10、Greed
11、Camp
12、Fresh Body Theme
detailed_description:
The world isn't horror, the horror is the fear inside.
There are some strange musics with us. When you hear them, the fear'll go away.

Record Tracks


1、Farm
2、Gluttony
3、Snow
4、Sloth
5、Forest
6、Envy
7、Volcano
8、Wrath
9、Mystical Laboratory
10、Greed
11、Camp
12、Fresh Body Theme

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Fresh Body: Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.00+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
